meta.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for table tx_sbportfolio2_domain_model_client

data.languageKey: The client's title. Used in the FE and in table listings in the BE. An alternative title for use in the FE. An alternative title for use in the FE when space is restricted. A short summary of the client. The client's full description, this can include links and images.> The date that this client became a client and you started working for them. The client's links. The client's main link. This could be a file for print material, or a url if the client has a website and so on. The client's testimonial. An image representing the client. The client's logo. The client's content slider title. The client's content slider image. The client's content slider description. The client's title for SEO metatags. The client's type for SEO metatags. The client's image for SEO metatags. Facebook uses a square image at least 50x50 pixels, the image cannot exceed 130x110 pixels. The client's description for SEO metatags. The client's Facebook Application ID. The client's Facebook Admin IDs. The date that this client should start showing up in the FE. The date that this client should stop showing up in the FE.
